availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to America H. Bingham Dyer on November 15, 1852. Father of William Dyer, Henry Dyer, and George Dyer. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union, p. 81.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Union, p. 23.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, file #000562172, p. 34-35.
